Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>I'm really interested in how these new neuron types affect the cross 
>product domain or other domains.  If you guys find anything 
>interesting please keep us up to date.
>
>ken
>  
>

I was already intending to do some function regression experiments next, 
so combining this with some work on multiplying [and other types of] 
neuron seems like a logical path to take. Right now though I'm  
writing-up my experiments with phased searching, which should be ready 
any day now. I plan to publish it (on the web sthat is) along with a new 
release of SharpNEAT with the Tic-Tac-Toe, OCR, Cross Prodct and 
Multiplication experiments and of course phased searching support, 
phew!  Although I need to re-do the experimental runs I did for phased 
searching before publishing, so it might be towards the end of the week.

Colin
